sentences.en: a nation characterized by cultural pluralism
sentences.cn: 以多元文化为特色的国家

sentences.en: Classroom teaching embodies the comprehensive evaluation, pluralism and objectivity.
sentences.cn: 课堂教学的评价体现了全面性 、 多元性和客观性.

sentences.en: He accepts that values follow pluralism and refuses value has social relativism.
sentences.cn: 这样,价值就是多元的,但不是相对主义的.

sentences.en: If just pursue pluralism very much, accomplish nothing instead in the end.
sentences.cn: 只是如果太过追求多元, 到头来反而一事无成.

sentences.en: Interest groups are a critical component of pluralism.
sentences.cn: 利益团体对于多元论来说是个关键性的构成要素.

sentences.en: It is also a timely recognition of methodological pluralism.
sentences.cn: 它同时也是对讲究方式方法的多元主义的及时认可.

sentences.en: It'should go on the way of pluralism to develop and make itself in feature.
sentences.cn: 学校要发展就必须走多元化之路,办出自己的特色.
多元论者坚持多元论的人.

sentences.en: Sadly, with a philosophy of relativism and a philosophy of pluralism science of logic doesn't matter.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾的是, 在相对主义和多元主义的哲学观里面,逻辑学已经变得不重要了.

sentences.en: The freedom and pluralism of the media shall be respected.
sentences.cn: 媒体之自由与多元性应受到尊重.

sentences.en: The membership of China computer Industry Association is showing a tendency of developmental pluralism.
sentences.cn: 中国计算机行业协会会员呈现多元化发展的态势.

sentences.en: The monism that value decides and value distributive pluralism can coexist.
sentences.cn: 价值决定的一元论和价值分配的多元论可以并存.

sentences.en: Therefore, Chinese contemporary art images show pluralism, commensal and prosperous features.
sentences.cn: 中国当代艺术图像也因此呈现出了多元、共生 、 繁盛的面貌.

sentences.en: This philosophical shift parallels the veer to pluralism on a world base.
sentences.cn: 诠释学的哲学转向与世界意义的多元化转向并行.

sentences.en: Traditional marriage idea has been impacted, from conservative to open, from monism to pluralism.
sentences.cn: 传统的婚姻受到猛烈的冲击, 中国人的婚姻呈现出从保守到开放 、 从一元到多元的变化.

sentences.en: We need further research on how to unite monism and pluralism on intelligence.
sentences.cn: 多元智力观与一元智力观如何统一还需作进一步研究.

words.tran_cn: 兼职者；多元论者；兼管数个教堂者

phrases.tran_cn: 文化多元主义；文化多元性

trans.tran_cn: 多元化，多元主义，多元性（不同种族、不同政治或宗教信仰的多种群体共存），兼职
trans.tran_en: when people of many different races, religions, and political beliefs live together in the same society, or the belief that this can happen successfully
